attributes.title: Made my phone glitch
attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch soo bad I had to get a new phone

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this app makes no sense! there is nothing to do and it WASTES YOUR BATTERY LIKE CRAZY. i was on this app for 10 minutes and i lost 12% of my battery!! #dumptrump

attributes.title: Awful!!!!
attributes.review:
Where do I start with how bad this app is!!!
This app is not only a violation of human rights but it is made for support a straight up orange!!! A FRUIT!!!!!! This app is the reason why I am moving to Canada!!! I ABSOLUTELY HHAATTEE THIS APP!!!! WITH A PATION!!!!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: My dogs went missing and I found them riled up on an American flag, the app is evil all of the spoons in my kitchen float when u open the app!!!

attributes.title: Got me hacked
attributes.review: I got hacked and now I can barely use my phone it’s such a bad app don’t download it unless your gen z

attributes.title: Imagine supporting Trump
attributes.review: It’s 2020 and y’all still wanna ignore that trump is a racist, rapist, sex trafficking, lame excuse for a president who doesn’t care about anyone except himself and money???? Can’t relate.

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: Straight up one of the worst apps made in history there is not much more I can say

attributes.title: App is a no go
attributes.review: It’s just sad to see that this app immediately collapsed 😥😓🧚🏻‍♂️💔💔after I opened it. Don’t download, app will not support you.

attributes.title: Trump 2020 but in the ground
attributes.review: Delete this app it glitches and gives out false information and sheds a good light on bad people.

attributes.title: anthony from tiktok ;)
attributes.review: worst app ever, made my house be infested of bugs and roaches. this app needs to be taken down it’s a waste of space on my phone. took such a long time to download. the music is the worst background music to ever have. btw i can smell the creators breath through the app. stinky.
